name: os-paths
description: Generate portable common OS paths (home, temp, ...)

scripts.coverage: run-s --silent _:max-node-8 && shx echo "[coverage] WARN Code coverage skipped [for NodeJS < v10]" 1>&2 || run-s _:coverage
scripts.cov:view: run-s cov:html && cd coverage && open-cli index.html
scripts.help:
< package.json node -e "s = {p:'',e:'npm'}; if (new String(process.env.npm_execpath).match(/yarn.js$/)) { s = {p:'
',e:'yarn'}; }; console.log('%susage: \`%s run TARGET [TARGET..]\`

TARGETs:
', s.p, s.e); re = /^.*?\x22(?:\W+\s*)([^#\x22]+)\s+#+\s+([^#\x22]+?)(\s+#+)?\x22.*$/; require('readline').createInterface({ input: process.stdin, output: process.stdout, terminal: false }).on('line', function(line){ if (match = re.exec(line)) { console.log('%s %s', match[1].padEnd(19), match[2]); } });"
scripts.lint: run-s --silent _:max-node-8 && shx echo "[lint] WARN Lint checks skipped [for NodeJS < v10]" 1>&2 || run-p lint:*
scripts.reset:hard: git clean -dfx && git reset --hard && npm install
scripts.test:types: run-s --silent _:max-node-8 && shx echo "[test:types] WARN Type testing skipped [for NodeJS < v10]" 1>&2 || tsd
scripts.update:changelog: run-s --silent _:update:changelog && (git diff --quiet --exit-code CHANGELOG.mkd || shx echo "[update] info CHANGELOG updated")
scripts._:coverage: run-s _:regen:build+test:code && is-ci && run-s cov:send || run-s cov:view
scripts._:vcs-clean-err: run-s --silent _:vcs-clean || (shx echo "[vcs] ERR! Uncommitted changes" 1>&2 & exit 1)
scripts._:vcs-strictly-clean-err: run-s --silent _:vcs-strictly-clean || (shx echo "[vcs] ERR! Uncommitted changes and/or untracked files" 1>&2 & exit 1)
scripts._:update:changelog: run-s --silent _:exists:git-changelog && git changelog > CHANGELOG.mkd || shx echo "[update] WARN CHANGELOG not updated" 1>&2
scripts._:update:dist.build: shx mkdir -p dist && shx cp -r build/cjs dist
scripts._:update:dist.pack: npm pack && shx mv os-paths-*.tgz dist/os-paths.tgz
scripts._:update:dist.types: shx mkdir -p dist && shx cp -r build/types dist
scripts._:version:spell:changelog_update: run-s --silent _:exists:git-changelog && git changelog -u | cspell stdin || shx echo "[lint] WARN CHANGELOG update `cspell` exception" 1>&2
scripts._:version:update:changelog: run-s --silent _:exists:git-changelog && node -e "v=require('./package.json').version; result=require('child_process').spawnSync('git changelog --next-tag v'+v,{shell:true,encoding:'utf-8'}); if (result.status != 0) {console.error('ERR! '+result.stderr); process.exit(1);} else {require('fs').writeFileSync('CHANGELOG.mkd',result.stdout);};" || shx echo "[version] WARN CHANGELOG not updated" 1>&2
scripts.version: run-s _:version:update:changelog lint:spell _:update:dist && git add CHANGELOG.mkd dist

devDependencies:#: * for testing, Node-v6 requires ava < v2 and nyc < v15
